DESCRIPTION:
Total War: Rome 2 will make it possible to control the first world superpower and command her striking and numerous armies to subdue opponents of political, military, or economic means. Game from the creators of the Total War series combines elements of real-time gameplay and stepping mode. During the campaign, move by move, you can conquer the land, and enjoy the battles involving tens of thousands of people under your command in real time. Heavily modified engine Warscape in Total War: Rome 2 will consider exotic cities to the smallest detail, and the new camera will make it possible to observe the battlefield from any angle.

Features:
- The creators of the Total War series celebrated again represent a strategic game, designed to the smallest detail, in which step by step gameplay blends with battles in real time.
- Conquer all states of the ancient world in a large-scale campaign.
- Take command of thousands of Roman army and lead it to victory in the great battles of antiquity.
- Enjoy the exotic species of majestic ancient cities, recreated on the screen in the smallest details, and bloody, but at the same time excellent battle scenes, when on the battlefield converge huge army. With our new camera control, you can monitor what is happening with the most favorable angles.
- Experience superior optimization games - Total War: Rome II works perfectly on stationary home computers, laptops and compact.
